alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and south central Leon Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodville, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Newport, Wakulla Springs, Natural Bridge, Vereen, Plum Orchard and Shadeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
